sub_title: Global Program Manager Commerce at the HEINEKEN Company
summary:
I am an accomplished business professional with a proven track record in delivering impactful results. Known for my strategic thinking, I excel in managing complex projects and aligning technology solutions with business objectives. In my current role as a Global Program Manager at The HEINEKEN Company, I have successfully led transformative initiatives, optimizing business value and streamlining IT operations.

During my tenure as a Manager at Accenture, I played a pivotal role in guiding clients through digital transformations, leveraging Microsoft technologies. My leadership and cross-functional team management skills contributed to uncovering value within organizations, resulting in successful implementations and growth opportunities.

As a Senior Business Analyst and Digital Transformation Consultant at Capgemini, I led teams and drove the adoption of Microsoft Dynamics CRM, enabling clients to achieve business objectives and operational efficiency. My ability to manage resources, resolve technical challenges, and lead change management initiatives has consistently delivered tangible business outcomes.

In addition, my experience at CRM Partners and AkzoNobel demonstrates my expertise in configuring and deploying CRM solutions globally, demonstrating a strong commitment to customer-centric strategies.

As a Resource Manager at Capgemini, I oversaw a large pool of resources, effectively matching skills with project needs and driving business growth.

I am a results-driven professional dedicated to driving organizational success through technology and strategic thinking.

education.field_of_study: Marketing  / Commerciële economie (CE) - Specialisatie Marketing Management

projects.title: Global Project Manager DOT & SEM @ Heineken

contributors.headline: Global Program Manager Commerce at the HEINEKEN Company

projects.title: Service Delivery Manager @ DSM
projects.description:
Strategic planning
• Defining DSM long-term business objectives within the Marketing and Sales domain
• Anticipating on future technology needs and plot on business goals
• Develop a strategic technology solution roadmap and collaborate across Microsoft and with DSM to bring customers to that Maturity state

Executive review
• Leading the coordination with DSM and other Microsoft account partners to focus on solution status and realised value, 
• Removing risks and blockers, and strategic planning.
• Tracking and reporting of status and progress across teams

Delivery and financial oversight
• Managing a key service of around 50FTE (30% on-shore; 70% Off-shore) 
• Responsible for Service delivery in a transforming company to a business Agile organization (working DevSecOps, CICD, etc.)
• Financially responsible for the engagement
• End responsible for execution of the service delivery agreements (contracts)
• Meeting all key performance indicators around impact, growth, revenue, solution adoption and customer satisfaction while conforming to Microsoft business practices.
• Coordination, triaging and communications during P1 (during local office hours) or P2incidents
• Coordination with 3rd party teams (Adobe, Microsoft, SAP) where necessary (including 3rd party application teams, DSM test factory, Security team etc.)

Relationship management 
• Regular customer engagement establishing as a trusted advisor to the customer executive with ownership of overall delivery success, key outcomes, satisfaction and loyalty.

Business development
• Identifying and qualifying engagement opportunities, assisting the sales and pursuit roles with deal shaping, approvals and closing.

contributors.headline: Global Program Manager Commerce at the HEINEKEN Company

profile_positions.description:
In my role as a D&T Global Agile Program Manager, I am an integral member of the Agile Acceleration (ACE) Leadership team, specifically within the Agile Program and Project Management (APPM) division. 

Key Responsibilities:
• Strategic Alignment: Ensure technology solutions are closely aligned with the strategic objectives and business goals of our organization.

• Project Portfolio Management: Oversee and successfully deliver a diverse portfolio of programs and projects in strict adherence to D&T and Agile methodologies. Leverage extensive multi-year experience to guide these initiatives to success.

• Value Optimization: Drive the optimization of business value, harmonizing it with the priorities of our Product Teams and Functional Domains.

• Agile Project Coordination: Lead a team of seasoned Agile Project Managers to efficiently coordinate the execution of intricate changes, from the inception of the business case to realization, all while adhering to Agile principles. This involves managing programs spanning multiple product teams, portfolios, departments, Operational Companies (OpCos), and regions, with a keen focus on handling cross-program dependencies.

• Financial oversight: Assume financial responsibility for the Commerce BETA Tribe, overseeing a budget of approximately €15 million.

• Agile Transformation: Spearhead the establishment of program structures and foster an Agile working culture across all Commerce Tribes within the organization.

• Coaching and Mentorship: Provide coaching and mentorship to product teams and project managers, enabling them to effectively deliver complex changes.

• Best Practices: Cultivate and disseminate best practices in program management, facilitating efficient and effective change delivery.

• Knowledge Sharing: Serve as a focal point for nurturing knowledge sharing pertaining to complex change delivery, and actively promote the adoption of sound program management practices throughout HEINEKEN.
profile_positions.title: Global Program Manager Commerce at the HEINEKEN Company

profile_positions.description:
As a Manager specializing in Microsoft Dynamics 365 (D365) strategy consulting within the Accenture Microsoft Business Group, my role extends across various crucial aspects:

• Leadership Position: I am an integral part of the Business Applications Leadership Team, where I actively shape and influence key decisions and strategies.

• Client Transformation: I guide our clients in their digital transformation journey, specifically focusing on enhancing their marketing, sales, commerce, and customer service functions. My expertise lies in aligning these transformations with their existing business processes.

• Value Creation: I specialize in identifying opportunities for value creation within our clients' organizations. This involves leveraging Microsoft technologies, particularly Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement and the Power Platform.

• Strategic Contribution: I play a pivotal role in contributing to our clients' Microsoft-focused vision, strategy, and roadmap, ensuring alignment with their broader business goals.

• Commercial Development: My responsibilities encompass identifying fresh commercial opportunities and actively participating in the development of business strategies. I collaborate closely with Accenture, Avanade, and Microsoft to create compelling value propositions.

• Knowledge Capitalization: I am dedicated to the development and dissemination of in-depth expertise in Business Applications. I also facilitate connections within Accenture's wider ecosystem to enhance our knowledge capital.

• Mentorship and Leadership Development: Internally, I hold roles as a People Lead and Career Counselor for our senior consultants, contributing to their growth and fostering a positive learning environment. Additionally, I lead the Microsoft Catalyst Program, which accelerates our internal capabilities and innovation.

My career has been marked by a commitment to driving transformation, and ensuring client success within the broader business strategy.
profile_positions.title: Manager Microsoft Strategy Consulting

profile_positions.description:
At De Nederlandsche Bank (DNB), my role as Teamlead and Business Consultant Customer Engagement was pivotal in supporting their mission for a stable financial system and a full digital transition by 2025. DNB implemented Dynamics CRM to execute supervisory processes efficiently, including international ones.

Key Responsibilities:
• Led a cross-functional team of internal staff and external contractors, ensuring seamless collaboration.
Managed resources and diligently addressed technical obstacles, guaranteeing prompt resolution or viable workarounds.

• Played a crucial role in driving the realization of genuine business value through active utilization of Microsoft Dynamics CRM, both on-premise and in the cloud.

• Engaged with key stakeholders such as Product Owners, senior management, and the delivery team to comprehensively grasp business requirements and propose suitable solutions.

• Orchestrated the delivery of Technical Support Services across multiple Microsoft support delivery teams, ensuring the achievement of robust IT infrastructure and operational stability to support customer outcomes.

• Managed change management and adoption initiatives, enhancing the productive use of Microsoft Dynamics (cloud) Technologies.

My contributions at DNB significantly contributed to their digital transformation objectives and the overall efficiency of their supervisory processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst and Digital Transformation Consultant Customer Engagement @ DNB

profile_positions.description:
Following the implementation of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015 On-Premise at Obvion, there was a strategic decision to enhance the Sales, Marketing, and Customer Service functions while transitioning to a cloud-based solution.

Key Responsibilities:
• Led a cross-functional team comprising both internal staff and external contractors, ensuring a cohesive and focused working environment by shielding the team from external distractions and conflicts.

• Effectively managed resources, swiftly addressing technical obstacles, and ensuring their resolution or identification of viable workarounds.

• Leveraged technical expertise to provide guidance on technology matters, contributing to the maturation of Customer IT capabilities and ensuring infrastructure health and operational stability.

• Collaborated closely with the customer and account teams to prioritize and strategize customer engagement initiatives, encompassing both cloud and on-premise Microsoft technologies.

• Successfully spearheaded an end-to-end migration of Dynamics CRM to the cloud, streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency.

• Strategically positioned the Dynamics CRM platform within Obvion Hypotheken's overarching strategy, aligning it with the organization's long-term goals and objectives.

My role at Obvion was instrumental in orchestrating a seamless transition to a cloud-based CRM solution and optimizing the platform to align with the company's strategic vision.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant Customer Engagement Obvion Hypotheken

profile_positions.description:
As a Business Analyst and Customer Engagement Consultant, I played a vital role in enabling digital chain collaboration by implementing Microsoft CRM and SharePoint for Investigations at the Public Prosecution Service.

Key Responsibilities:
• Developed comprehensive Business Architecture, incorporating scope, processes, alternatives, and risk assessments.

• Analyzed the client's business requirements and CRM processes through various means, including document analysis, interviews, workshops, and workflow analysis.

• Translated these requirements into more than 10 tangible deliverables, including functional specifications, use cases, user stories, workflow/process diagrams, and data flow/data model diagrams.

• Actively configured the system within the Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform to meet the specified requirements.

• Conducted rigorous testing, encompassing multiple levels such as functional, regression, user acceptance, integration, and performance testing, ensuring alignment with the client's needs.

My contributions were instrumental in facilitating digital collaboration within the Public Prosecution Service, enhancing efficiency, and meeting the organization's objectives.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst & Customer Engagement Consultant Openbaar Ministerie

profile_positions.description:
Following the completion of the CRM system in late 2015, AkzoNobel embarked on a global rollout initiative. Given the system's global scope, each rollout necessitated a meticulous analysis of functionality relevance and security model integrity. Subsequently, after deploying the Global Sales CRM system, AkzoNobel sought to configure and implement a Complaint Handling System, utilizing out-of-the-box functionalities within Microsoft Dynamics CRM.

Key Responsibilities:
• Translated these requirements into more than 10 tangible deliverables, including functional specifications, use cases, user stories, workflow/process diagrams, and data flow/data model diagrams.

• Actively configured the system within the Microsoft Dynamics CRM environment, tailoring it to meet the specified requirements.

• Engaged as a vital member of a Scrum team tasked with transitioning 2500+ users from CRM2015 to D365. This role involved active participation in numerous requirement meetings with business stakeholders, offering guidance on feasible solutions and ensuring continuous alignment with business requirements.

• Spearheaded efforts to address technical debt accumulated in CRM2015, while promoting the utilization of the platform's latest features.

• Developed multiple entity forms, such as Opportunity and Account, to showcase to various business areas, making adjustments as necessary.

• Designed and deployed customized CRM Dashboards tailored to specific team roles, benefiting over 2500 users across five diverse global business units.

• Analyzed Complaint Management Requirements and expertly configured them within Microsoft Dynamics 365.

• Orchestrated and managed the User Acceptance Testing phase, ensuring the system's fitness for purpose and compliance with user expectations.

My contributions at AkzoNobel significantly facilitated the global rollout of the CRM system, streamlined complaint handling processes, and improved user experiences worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst and Functional CRM Consultant at AkzoNobel Specialty Chemicals

profile_positions.description:
Managed a workforce of approximately 200 professionals within Capgemini NL's Digital Customer Experience Business Unit. Key responsibilities included:

Key Responsibilities:
• Addressing resource requests from Project and Program Managers, both nationally and internationally.
Identifying and presenting suitable candidates' CVs to fulfill specific project needs.

• Preparing and coaching candidates for client meetings.

• Strategically assigning consultants to roles that aligned with their career growth and met the business requirements.

• Collaborating closely with Business Team Leads for efficient resource allocation.

• Cultivating new opportunities by networking with Account Managers and other international Resource Managers, fostering relationships with Sector Interfaces.

• Ensuring the currency of resource profiles through continuous training and CV reviews.

• Providing weekly Management Information to Capability Team Heads, Business Operation Managers, and fellow Consultants, as needed.

My role significantly contributed to optimizing resource management, facilitating successful project execution, and enhancing client satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Resource Manager Digital Customer Experience BU (via Capgemini)
